aka: Charles Dickens with Gyles Brandreth/查尔斯·狄更斯的足迹/追随脚步：查尔斯·狄更斯

cast.name: 盖尔斯·布兰德雷斯 Gyles Brandreth

this_title: In Charles Dickens' Footsteps with Gyles Brandreth
trans_title: 贾尔斯·布伦迪斯的文学探秘之查尔斯·狄更斯的足迹
追随脚步：查尔斯·狄更斯
introduction: Gyles Brandreth travels across Britain visiting the places that inspired one of Britain's most famous storytellers - Charles Dickens. Gyles unlocks the secrets behind the author's unforgettable novels, delves into their history and uncovers the true-life events that inspired some of the greatest stories ever told.
chinese_title: 贾尔斯·布伦迪斯的文学探秘之查尔斯·狄更斯的足迹
foreign_title: In Charles Dickens' Footsteps with Gyles Brandreth
